name: Eda Akturk
description: Developer & Educator. I'm part of BuidlGuidl, where I work closely with Ethereum developers to build tools and educational content for the Ethereum ecosystem. I'm also a Developer Advocate at Hyperlane, where I focus on cross-chain messaging and interoperability. You can check out my blog for the topics I'm interested in and some of my writing: https://mirror.xyz/edatweets.eth
